title: How-To Guide: Using the Scenarios Homepage

content.text: Scenarios allow you to relive real historical market events and practice trading in a safe, risk-free environment. Each scenario recreates a specific period in market history using actual price data from that time.

content.title: Why Scenarios Matter
items: You learn how markets reacted during real events such as political shocks, supply-chain disruptions, or financial crises.
You can practice trading without risking real money.
You can retry the same scenario multiple times to refine your skills and strategies.
You build confidence by making decisions based on real market behaviour.

content.text: Every scenario uses authentic historical stock price movements. This means the ups, downs, volatility, and trends you see are exactly what happened in real life.

content.title: Benefits of Real Historical Data
items: Improves your understanding of how markets respond to global events.
Helps you practice reading true price reactions, not artificially generated data.
Gives you a realistic environment to test your decision-making.
Allows you to study cause-and-effect: what happened, why it happened, and how the market responded.

content.text: Scenarios also run at accelerated speed—price updates can occur every 2 seconds—allowing you to experience an entire month of market activity in minutes.

items: When the globe appears, you will see glowing circles placed across different regions. These represent scenarios.
Hover over a beacon to view its name and short description.
Click the beacon to open a preview card.
Use the button within the preview to join the scenario.
Click on any country or region on the Earth.
A timeline will appear, showing all scenarios related to that area.
Each scenario appears as a node within the timeline.
Select a node to view scenario information and join it.
Click the 'View All Scenarios' button.
You will see a complete list of every scenario in the system.
Scenarios are grouped into categories such as Joinable or Already Joined.
You can scroll, browse, and choose any scenario you want to begin.

content.text: The My Scenarios panel allows you to keep track of every scenario you have joined.

content.title: Tab Categories
items: Not Started — Scenarios you joined but have not yet begun.
In Progress — Scenarios you are currently working through.
Completed — Scenarios you have finished; you may retry them anytime.

content.text: Every scenario attempt generates AI-powered insights that analyse your trading performance.

content.title: Types of Insights
items: Detailed Insights — Includes charts, P/L analysis, scenario-specific patterns, and improvement suggestions.
Compact Insights — A simplified text-only version for quick review.

content.text: You can access your most recent insights anytime through the 'Show Last Attempt Insights' link on the scenario card.
